SELECT a.a_c_id, at.at_type AS aType, h.h_name AS hName, a.a_time, u.u_name AS uName, c.c_project AS cProject, s.s_sum AS sSum FROM appointment a LEFT JOIN atype at ON a.a_type_id=at.at_id LEFT JOIN hospital h ON a.a_h_id=h.h_id LEFT JOIN customer c ON a.a_c_id=c.c_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON c.c_u_id=u.u_id LEFT JOIN success s ON c.c_id=s.s_c_id WHERE c.c_id = #{cId} ORDER BY a.a_time DESC
